text: During the 1913–14 season Hearts competed in the Scottish First Division, the Scottish Cup and the East of Scotland Shield. ==Fixtures== ===Dunedin Cup=== ===Wilson Cup=== ===Rosebery Charity Cup=== ===Scottish Cup=== ===Scottish First Division=== ==See also== *List of Heart of Midlothian F.C. seasons ==References== *Statistical Record 13-14 ==External links== *Official Club website Category:Heart of Midlothian F.C. seasons Heart of Midlothian
title: 1913–14 Heart of Midlothian F.C. season
